revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: (1. H.) [† The most honorable Theodoros], son of Obodianos, [has given] on account [of his taxes . . . ] on behalf of Aidrallos? . . . eighth [indiction] and including it [ . . . that devolved] on the . . . from the inheritance of Michael . . . and for Mal Kou- . . . one hundredth . . . of Alpheios, the most blessed [ . . . all the exacted and extra taxes in farm products], in oinokreon and [in ? products . . . Written in the month . . . of the year four hundred] and thirty-nine, in the eighth indiction.] (2. H) [† I, Flavius Patrikios, son of Ailianos,] comes?. . . half part from [ . . . . . as written above, having signed accordingly] with my own hand. † (3. H.) [† I, Flavius Ailianos, son of Monaxios, . . . ] have received jointly . . . half . . . [as] written above, [having signed] accordingly [with my own hand. †] (4. H.) [† I, Flavius Nikias, son of Monaxios,] politeuomenos, have received jointly . . . of one twenty-fourth part on account of the ﬁfth.. . [as] written above, [having signed] accordingly [with my own hand. †].
